@title Bazaar

nodes.documentation: @dev This modifier helps to revert a function if it is called by any account that is not an admin.
nodes.name: onlyAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev This modifier helps to revert a function if it is called by any account that is not a store owner.
nodes.name: onlyStoreOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev The constructor adds the owner to the list of admins.

@dev This function helps get a list of store contract addresses that the msg.sender is the owner of.
@return The list of store contract addresses.
nodes.name: getStoreAddressesByOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address payable,string memory,string memory) returns (contract Store)

nodes.name: createNewStore

@dev This function defines the user category of the msg.sender.
@return A string indicating what type of user msg.sender is.
nodes.name: getUserType

nodes.documentation: @dev This function adds a request for msg.sender to become a store owner (pending admin approval).
nodes.name: addStoreOwnerRequest
addStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function gets all the store owner requests.
@return A list of all the addresses of the open requests.

nodes.documentation:
@dev This function adds a new admin to the bazaar.
@param newAdmin is the address of the new admin to add.
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev This function allows admins to withdraw any funds sent to the contract.
nodes.name: withdraw

devdoc.details: This contract contains the required functions to manage the operations of the Bazaar(Marketplace).

addAdmin(address).details: This function adds a new admin to the bazaar.

params.newAdmin: is the address of the new admin to add.

addStoreOwner(uint256,address).details: This function adds a new store owner from the list of requests.

params.index: is the index in the list of requests of the approved store owner.
params.storeOwner: is the address of the store owner being approved.

addStoreOwnerRequest().details: This function adds a request for msg.sender to become a store owner (pending admin approval).

constructor.details: The constructor adds the owner to the list of admins.

createNewStore(string,string).details: This function generates a new store contract with msg.sender as the owner.

params.description: is the description of the store.
params.name: is the name of the store.

getStoreAddressesByOwner().details: This function helps get a list of store contract addresses that the msg.sender is the owner of.
getStoreAddressesByOwner().return: The list of store contract addresses.

getStoreOwnerRequests().details: This function gets all the store owner requests.
getStoreOwnerRequests().return: A list of all the addresses of the open requests.

getUserType().details: This function defines the user category of the msg.sender.
getUserType().return: A string indicating what type of user msg.sender is.

withdraw().details: This function allows admins to withdraw any funds sent to the contract.

devdoc.title: Bazaar
